args:
Sylvia returns to her true form, Harle beats a
retreat, and the village is saved. However,
the damage is great, and so Melsa stays behind
to help with the reconstruction. As she and
Sarisse say a tearful farewell, the prince says
he hopes to see her back at the castle someday.
The tear in space is going to close!
Hey, check it out! There's this gross smoky\nstuff coming out of it!
It's the black mana that was controlling\nHypnos!
All of the copies in this world are\ndisappearing!
Which means we actually beat the REAL\nHypnos in the space between worlds!
Back...to normal? Ah, I remember now.
I was caught by the Empire and changed\ninto a fiend through the use of black mana.
And you were gracious enough to rescue\nme from that fate. You have my thanks.
My, what an unexpected conclusion.\nYou ACTUALLY defeated Hypnos!
And yet, I now understand quite well,\nmy dear Prince {player_name}...
If I hope to end your life, I will need a\nfiend even more powerful than Hypnos!
Please look forward to our next meeting.\nI know I will!
Hey, those chumps are running away!\nWe gotta chase 'em!
We have more important things to attend\nto, Notte. We need to find out how badly\nthe village has been damaged.
Yeah, that Hypnos copy was making an\nabsolute mess of things.
There's smoke rising from all over the\nplace, and the buildings look like they've\nbeen totally wrecked.
Let's start by helping the wounded. We'll\ndeal with the material concerns after that.
Welp! It's about time to go.
I remain so sorry for everything.
I betrayed you all, and yet you've done so\nmuch to help me.
I can't possibly thank you enough.
Oh, please. I'm the one who should be\napologizing here.
Your village is still a mess, but we're\ntaking off for the Halidom anyway!
It's fine. I know {player_name}\nhas matters which require\nhis attention.
I couldn't possibly keep you here forever\non our account.
Plus, thanks to you all, we've rebuilt\nenough to at least scrape out some\nsemblance of a living.
At this point, getting the village back to\nthe way it once was is our responsibility.
This is where I'm going to live, after all.
Yeah, that makes sense. *sniff*\nYou always were smart like that. *sniff*
Oh man, now I'm gettin' weepy. *sniiiiiff*
I told myself I'd hold it together when we\nleft, and now I'm a huge blubbery mess.
You're gonna worry about me if I cry...\nC'mon, Sarisse, pull it together!
No, Sarisse. This makes me happy.\n*sniff*
Ah! Now your crying has spread to me!
*sniff* This is no good... If I act like this\nwhen we're about to say goodbye, I...
Then YOU won't be able to go back home\nwithout worrying about ME!
No, Melsa. This is not goodbye.
It is your duty to restore the village.\nIt is something you must do.
However, once you have seen that duty\ndone, you are free to do as you wish.
At which point, I believe you ought hurry\nto {player_name}'s castle and\njoin him with your head held high.
...That is what I intend to do, at least.
I'd be delighted to have you, but are you\nsure that's all right? Aren't you supposed\nto be this village's guardian?
Indeed I am—which is why I must do\nthis thing.
I must help you guide this kingdom\ntoward the path of peace. That is how\nI can best protect my village.
In that case, I welcome your aid.
Someday, I shall rally at your side.
Y-you're going to leave the village...?
See, Melsa? If Sylvia's gonna join us,\nthen you HAVE to!
I want that more than anything!

And yet, I can't even come close to
imagining what a life outside the
village is like. We don't ever leave,
after all—
Once, you let the customs of this place\nexcuse your fear of leaping into the\nunknown.
But you are that person no longer.\nWhat do you WANT, Melsa?
I want to be with Sarisse!
When this village is finally restored,\nplease let me join you!
You better fix this place up toot sweet,\ngirl; I'm gonna miss you like crazy.
But since I KNOW you're coming back,\nI'm not gonna say goodbye.
No matter how far away we might be or\nhow much time might pass...
